summary: This FBI case status report documents the transfer and upcoming arraignment of Ghislaine Maxwell on child sex trafficking charges, and includes a detailed inventory of other unrelated investigative operations being monitored by the squad. It notes significant media attention on the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the 'Child Sex Trafficking' investigation in the SDNY. The document's primary case appears to be related to him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Was transferred to MDC Brooklyn and is scheduled for arraignment and bail hearing. The document states her case is being covered regularly by national media.

persons.name: Amanda Young
persons.context: Listed as a case agent (C/A) for the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking investigation in the SDNY.

persons.name: Paul Byrne
persons.context: Listed as a case agent (C/A) alongside SA Amanda Young for the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking investigation.

persons.name: Eric Foskey
persons.context: Named as the subject/title of multiple unrelated investigative operations (e.g., 'Eric Foskey', 'Operation Fed Up') listed in the squad's inventory.

persons.name: Carlos Arvey Bonilla Diaz
persons.context: Named as the subject of an unrelated GPS investigation (Carlos Arvey Bonilla Diaz) in the squad's inventory.

persons.name: Roman Martinez
persons.context: Named as a subject (et al) in an unrelated Ping Order investigation in the squad's inventory.

persons.name: Lavaughn Campbell
persons.context: Named as the subject of an unrelated Ping Order investigation in the squad's inventory.

persons.name: Patrick Chattel
persons.context: Named as the subject/title of an unrelated Pole Camera investigation ('Patrick Chattel') in the squad's inventory.

connections.description: The document lists the primary case as 'Jeffrey Epstein; Child Sex Trafficking' and immediately details the transfer and hearing for Maxwell, strongly implying their legal connection in the same investigation.
Listed together as case agents (C/A(s)) for the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking investigation.
SA Amanda Young is listed as a case agent for the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking investigation.
Det. Paul Byrne is listed as a case agent for the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking investigation.

events.title: Maxwell Transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred from the Merrimack County Jail in New Hampshire to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Maxwell Arraignment and Bail Hearing
events.description: Scheduled arraignment and bail hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell in the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The courtroom was to be closed but the hearing broadcast live via video link.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was in custody and transferred to Brooklyn's MDC on July 6, 2020, ahead of her arraignment.
Maxwell's July 14, 2020, arraignment and bail hearing was a significant event, with the courtroom closed but proceedings broadcast via video link due to public interest.
The document confirms the ongoing SDNY investigation into 'Jeffrey Epstein; Child Sex Trafficking' with assigned case agents.
The reporting squad (C-20) was also managing a large inventory of other, unrelated criminal investigations, indicating the Epstein/Maxwell case was one among many.
National media was regularly covering the Ghislaine Maxwell case at the time of this report.
